item.title: Taint manager eviction
item.description: Official document: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/taint-and-toleration/#taint-based-evictions For current kubernetes, Taint based Evictions support as follows, tolerations node.kubernetes.io/not-ready:NoExecute for 300s and node.kubernetes.io/unreachable:NoExecute for 300s are marked on pods in default by k8s when deploy, it means that pods can tolerate these taints for 300s. $ kubectl describe po my-pod-787f46887-cx2gt | grep -i node Node: edge/192.168.0.4 Tolerations: node.kubernetes.io/not-ready:NoExecute for 300s node.kubernetes.io/unreachable:NoExecute for 300s once a slave node was disconnected from cluster, taints node.
